> 
> "Cliffjumper" Firedrill yelled, he knew that scream. He quickly 
reved
> his engine, and zoomed towards the noise, forgetting everything 
around
> him.

::REDHOT::

    From his vantage point, he could see everything. He saw sludge and 
what he *thought* were old friends. He saw an Autobot short out and 
fall. He powered on ahead and landed safely beside the others, hoping 
his colours didn't tip them off. 
    "Hey....don't I know you from somewhere?" Redhot said with a 
mischevious glare..."I could swear I saw you last Saturday at the 
local inn!" He looked at Firedrill. "Thanks for the use of your back 
seat..so to speak. No offence taken I hope." He winked suggestively in 
a none too polite but aristroctratic way. "Heheheh...Primus I love 
days like this" he said, laughing.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
